front.title: A YANG Data Model for Network Diagnosis using Scheduled Sequences of OAM Tests

abstract.t: This document defines a YANG data model for network diagnosis on- demand relying upon Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM) tests. This document defines both 'oam-unitary-test' and 'oam-test- sequence' YANG modules to manage the lifecycle of network diagnosis procedures, primarily intended for use by an SDN controller or network orchestrator, rather than by individual network nodes.
